thread.title: French Telecoms Tycoon Drahi to Hire Alcatel-Lucent CEO Combes for Top Jobs
thread.title_full: French Telecoms Tycoon Drahi to Hire Alcatel-Lucent CEO Combes for Top Jobs - WSJ

author: Inti Landauro
title: French Telecoms Tycoon Drahi to Hire Alcatel-Lucent CEO Combes for Top Jobs
text:
PARIS—French telecommunications tycoon Patrick Drahi will hire Michel Combes, the outgoing chief executive of Alcatel-Lucent SA, to take top jobs at his French company Numericable-SFR SA and his holding company Altice NV, a person close to the matter said Thursday.
Mr. Combes, who is due to leave Alcatel-Lucent Sept. 1 ahead of its takeover by Finland’s Nokia Corp., will become chairman of Numericable-SFR and chief operating officer... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
